support_single_mul_subset:
/-
Copyright (c) 2022 Damiano Testa. All rights reserved.
Released under Apache 2.0 license as described in the file LICENSE.
Authors: Damiano Testa
-/
theorem support_single_mul_subset [decidable_eq G] [Mul G] (f : monoid_algebra k G) (r : k) (a : G) :
    (single a r * f : monoid_algebra k G).support ⊆ Finset.image ((· * ·) a) f.support :=
  by
  intro x hx
  contrapose hx
  have : ∀ y, a * y = x → f y = 0 := by
    simpa only [not_and', mem_image, mem_support_iff, exists_prop, not_exists, not_not] using hx
  simp only [mem_support_iff, mul_apply, sum_single_index, zero_mul, if_t_t, sum_zero, not_not]
  exact
    finset.sum_eq_zero
      (by
        simp (config := { contextual := true }) only [this, mem_support_iff, mul_zero, ne.def, ite_eq_right_iff,
          eq_self_iff_true, imp_true_iff])
#align support_single_mul_subset support_single_mul_subset
support_single_mul_eq_image:
theorem support_single_mul_eq_image [decidable_eq G] [Mul G] (f : monoid_algebra k G) {r : k}
    (hr : ∀ y, r * y = 0 ↔ y = 0) {x : G} (lx : IsLeftRegular x) :
    (single x r * f : monoid_algebra k G).support = Finset.image ((· * ·) x) f.support :=
  by
  refine' subset_antisymm (support_single_mul_subset f _ _) fun y hy => _
  obtain ⟨y, yf, rfl⟩ : ∃ a : G, a ∈ f.support ∧ x * a = y := by simpa only [Finset.mem_image, exists_prop] using hy
  simp only [mul_apply, mem_support_iff.mp yf, hr, mem_support_iff, sum_single_index, finsupp.sum_ite_eq', ne.def,
    not_false_iff, if_true, zero_mul, if_t_t, sum_zero, lx.eq_iff]
#align support_single_mul_eq_image support_single_mul_eq_image
support_single_mul:
theorem support_single_mul [add_left_cancel_semigroup G] (f : add_monoid_algebra k G) (r : k)
    (hr : ∀ y, r * y = 0 ↔ y = 0) (x : G) :
    (single x r * f : add_monoid_algebra k G).support = f.support.map (addLeftEmbedding x) :=
  @monoid_algebra.support_single_mul k (Multiplicative G) _ _ _ _ hr _
#align support_single_mul support_single_mul
support_mul_single_subset:
theorem support_mul_single_subset [decidable_eq G] [Mul G] (f : monoid_algebra k G) (r : k) (a : G) :
    (f * single a r).support ⊆ Finset.image (· * a) f.support :=
  by
  intro x hx
  contrapose hx
  have : ∀ y, y * a = x → f y = 0 := by
    simpa only [not_and', mem_image, mem_support_iff, exists_prop, not_exists, not_not] using hx
  simp only [mem_support_iff, mul_apply, sum_single_index, zero_mul, if_t_t, sum_zero, not_not]
  exact
    finset.sum_eq_zero
      (by
        simp (config := { contextual := true }) only [this, sum_single_index, ite_eq_right_iff, eq_self_iff_true,
          imp_true_iff, zero_mul])
#align support_mul_single_subset support_mul_single_subset
support_mul_single_eq_image:
theorem support_mul_single_eq_image [decidable_eq G] [Mul G] (f : monoid_algebra k G) {r : k}
    (hr : ∀ y, y * r = 0 ↔ y = 0) {x : G} (rx : IsRightRegular x) :
    (f * single x r).support = Finset.image (· * x) f.support :=
  by
  refine' subset_antisymm (support_mul_single_subset f _ _) fun y hy => _
  obtain ⟨y, yf, rfl⟩ : ∃ a : G, a ∈ f.support ∧ a * x = y := by simpa only [Finset.mem_image, exists_prop] using hy
  simp only [mul_apply, mem_support_iff.mp yf, hr, mem_support_iff, sum_single_index, finsupp.sum_ite_eq', ne.def,
    not_false_iff, if_true, mul_zero, if_t_t, sum_zero, rx.eq_iff]
#align support_mul_single_eq_image support_mul_single_eq_image
support_mul_single:
theorem support_mul_single [add_right_cancel_semigroup G] (f : add_monoid_algebra k G) (r : k)
    (hr : ∀ y, y * r = 0 ↔ y = 0) (x : G) :
    (f * single x r : add_monoid_algebra k G).support = f.support.map (addRightEmbedding x) :=
  @monoid_algebra.support_mul_single k (Multiplicative G) _ _ _ _ hr _
#align support_mul_single support_mul_single
support_mul:
theorem support_mul [decidable_eq G] [Add G] (a b : add_monoid_algebra k G) :
    (a * b).support ⊆ a.support.bUnion fun a₁ => b.support.bUnion fun a₂ => {a₁ + a₂} :=
  @monoid_algebra.support_mul k (Multiplicative G) _ _ _ _ _
#align support_mul support_mul
mem_span_support':
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr '' » -/
/-- An element of `add_monoid_algebra k G` is in the subalgebra generated by its support, using
unbundled inclusion. -/
theorem mem_span_support' (f : add_monoid_algebra k G) :
    f ∈ submodule.span k («expr '' » (of' k G) (f.support : set G)) := by
  rw [of', ← finsupp.supported_eq_span_single, finsupp.mem_supported]
#align mem_span_support' mem_span_support'
mem_span_support:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr '' » -/
/-- An element of `add_monoid_algebra k G` is in the submodule generated by its support. -/
theorem mem_span_support [add_zero_class G] (f : add_monoid_algebra k G) :
    f ∈ submodule.span k («expr '' » (of k G) (f.support : set G)) := by
  rw [of, MonoidHom.coe_mk, ← finsupp.supported_eq_span_single, finsupp.mem_supported]
#align mem_span_support mem_span_support
